dcterms:description: The Robots dataset features multi-view synthetic videos of 8 topologically varied robots, making it well suited for testing pose articulation performance.
dcterms:title: Robots dataset

dcterms:creator: Albert Pumarola
Enric Corona
Gerard Pons-Moll
Francesc Moreno-Noguer
dcterms:description: The Blender dataset is a sparse multi-view synthetic dataset with 5 humanoid and 2 other articulated objects, used for testing the fidelity of image detail reconstruction.
dcterms:title: Blender dataset

dcterms:creator: Sida Peng
Yuanqing Zhang
Yinghao Xu
Qianqian Wang
Qing Shuai
Hujun Bao
Xiaowei Zhou
dcterms:description: The ZJU-MoCap dataset is a common test suite for dynamic human reconstruction, evaluating multi-view sequences with a focus on human motion.
dcterms:title: ZJU-MoCap dataset
